asking for their views on Google's business practices by Feb. 11. The commission is expected to take several months to digest the feedback. Google reiterated Monday it was co-operating with the regulator. There's always going to be room for improvement, so we'll be working with the commission to address any concerns, spokesman Al Verney said. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Microsoft's Server and Tools Business-in many ways the epicenter of its cloud strategy-is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of longtime division president Bob Muglia. While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a Jan. 10 email to employees announcing Muglia's removal. "We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing."

the White House. The site describes Mike Pence as "the conservative champion." " Mike Pence describes himself as` first a Christian, then a conservative, then a Republican," Benko said.
